DarkMouse::

She finished with the commands on the conputer and hear a loud metal 
scratching noice as the room vent closed and locked down. "Commander, 
it's done. The base is locked down completely. Not even a mouse could 
get through."

She smirked as she realized what she just said.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "There should be a lock down. Dark Mouse, if there is, do it.
> As for the hull, i dont know."
> He turns his attentian back to Quickstrike.
> "Killfest is right. Kill him, now."
